mapper.sql: SQL_ID, SQL_CODE, SQL_TYPE, SQL_FROM, SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID, SQL_INTO, SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID, SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE, SQL_NUM, SQL_DESC, COM_ID, PID, PRE_ID, NEXT_ID, BUSS_TYPE, ES_STATUS, INSERT_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, OPERATOR, SUB_BUSS_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_DEF_SQL
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_DEF_SQL (SQL_ID, SQL_CODE, SQL_TYPE, SQL_FROM, SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID, SQL_INTO, SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID, SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE, SQL_NUM, SQL_DESC, COM_ID, PID, PRE_ID, NEXT_ID, BUSS_TYPE, ES_STATUS, INSERT_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, OPERATOR, SUB_BUSS_TYPE) values (#{sqlId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlFromJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sqlInto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlIntoJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sqlIntoTargetTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sqlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{esStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subBussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_DEF_SQL
SQL_ID,
SQL_CODE,
SQL_TYPE,
SQL_FROM,
SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID,
SQL_INTO,
SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID,
SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE,
SQL_NUM,
SQL_DESC,
COM_ID,
PID,
PRE_ID,
NEXT_ID,
BUSS_TYPE,
ES_STATUS,
INSERT_TIME,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
OPERATOR,
SUB_BUSS_TYPE,

mapper.update:
update T_DEF_SQL
SQL_ID = #{record.sqlId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_CODE = #{record.sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_TYPE = #{record.sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_FROM = #{record.sqlFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID = #{record.sqlFromJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_INTO = #{record.sqlInto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID = #{record.sqlIntoJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE = #{record.sqlIntoTargetTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_NUM = #{record.sqlNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_DESC = #{record.sqlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_ID = #{record.comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PID = #{record.pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRE_ID = #{record.preId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEXT_ID = #{record.nextId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUSS_TYPE = #{record.bussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ES_STATUS = #{record.esStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSERT_TIME = #{record.insertTime,jdbcType=DATE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{record.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
OPERATOR = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_BUSS_TYPE = #{record.subBussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_DEF_SQL set SQL_ID = #{record.sqlId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_CODE = #{record.sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_TYPE = #{record.sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_FROM = #{record.sqlFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID = #{record.sqlFromJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_INTO = #{record.sqlInto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID = #{record.sqlIntoJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE = #{record.sqlIntoTargetTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_NUM = #{record.sqlNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_DESC = #{record.sqlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{record.comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PID = #{record.pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRE_ID = #{record.preId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEXT_ID = #{record.nextId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSS_TYPE = #{record.bussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ES_STATUS = #{record.esStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSERT_TIME = #{record.insertTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{record.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, OPERATOR = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_BUSS_TYPE = #{record.subBussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_DEF_SQL
SQL_CODE = #{sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_TYPE = #{sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_FROM = #{sqlFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID = #{sqlFromJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_INTO = #{sqlInto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID = #{sqlIntoJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE = #{sqlIntoTargetTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_NUM = #{sqlNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SQL_DESC = #{sqlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRE_ID = #{preId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEXT_ID = #{nextId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUSS_TYPE = #{bussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ES_STATUS = #{esStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=DATE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_BUSS_TYPE = #{subBussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SQL_ID = #{sqlId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_DEF_SQL set SQL_CODE = #{sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_TYPE = #{sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_FROM = #{sqlFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_FROM_JDBC_ID = #{sqlFromJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_INTO = #{sqlInto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_INTO_JDBC_ID = #{sqlIntoJdbcId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_INTO_TARGET_TABLE = #{sqlIntoTargetTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_NUM = #{sqlNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SQL_DESC = #{sqlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRE_ID = #{preId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEXT_ID = #{nextId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSS_TYPE = #{bussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ES_STATUS = #{esStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_BUSS_TYPE = #{subBussType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SQL_ID = #{sqlId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select distinct sql_code "sqlCode", sql_desc "sqlDesc" from t_def_sql where sub_buss_type='MONITOR_CONFIG'
select count(1) from t_def_sql a, t_def_sql_info b where a.sql_id = b.sql_id and a.sub_buss_type = 'BATCH_CONFIG'

select tAlias.* from ( select nAlias.*, rownum r_rownum from ( select a.sql_id "sqlId", a.sql_code "sqlcode", a.sql_desc "sqlDesc", b.sql_info "sqlInfo", (select c.code_alias from t_def_code_dict c where c.code = a.es_status and c.code_type = 'ES_STATUS') "esStatus" from t_def_sql a, t_def_sql_info b where a.sql_id = b.sql_id and a.sub_buss_type = 'BATCH_CONFIG'
) nAlias ) tAlias where r_rownum >=#{queryStartIndex} and #{queryEndIndex} >= r_rownum
SELECT SQL_INFO FROM t_def_sql_info WHERE SQL_ID = #{sqlId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
